original_text: Then King Asa told all the men in Judah to do some hard work. They had to carry away from Ramah all the big stones and the wood that Baasha had been using there. Then King Asa used those things to make Geba and Mizpah strong towns again.
korean_text: 아사 왕이 온 유다 무리를 거느리고 바아사가 라마를 건축하던 돌과 재목을 운반하여다가 게바와 미스바를 건축하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then King Asa told all the men in Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 아사 왕이 유다의 모든 남자들에게 명령했다

sentences.original_text: They had to carry away from Ramah
all the big stones and the wood
that Baasha had been using there
Then King Asa used those things
to make Geba and Mizpah strong towns again
sentences.korean_translation: 게바와 미스바를 다시 강한 성읍으로 만들기 위해
